snippet: Many were surprised when the government of President Hassan Rouhani donated $400,000 to the Dr. Sapir Hospital, except for the hospital staff and for the neighbors who use it.
abstract: Iranian Pres Hassan Rouhani's donation of $400,000 to Jewish-run Dr Sapir Hospital and Charity Center in Tehran comes as surprise to many, but not to hospital's staff and patients, who see Iranian Jews as important and valid part of country, despite being religious minority.
lead_paragraph: Many were surprised when the government of President Hassan Rouhani donated $400,000 to the Dr. Sapir Hospital, except for the hospital staff and for the neighbors who use it.

headline.main: Jewish Hospital a Fixture in Tehran
headline.print_headline: Jewish Hospital a Fixture in Tehran
